All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AppCtx
The Application Context provides a number of services to a parent application while simplifying the interfaces needed to use them.
BitUtl
The BitUtl class provides utility methods for bitwise mask operations.
BufUtl
The BufUtl class provides utility methods for managing serialization and de-serialization of core Java data types.
CfgMgr
The Configuration Manager provides a collection of convenience methods for managing application properties.
Data
The Data class captures the constants, enumerated types and utility methods for the data package.
Data.GraphData
 
Data.GraphObject
 
Data.GraphStructure
 
Data.Operator
 
Data.Order
 
Data.Type
 
DataAnalyzer
The Data Analyzer class will examine small-to-medium sized data sets to determine their type and value composition.
DataDoc
A DataDoc manages a collection of data items representing a document.
DataDocConsole
The DataDocConsole class provides a convenient way for an application to capture data input from the console.
DataDocDiff
The DataDocDiff is responsible for comparing two DataDoc instances and determining if they differ and how.
DataDocJSON
This I/O utility class provides methods to save/load data document instances as JSON documents.
DataDocLogger
This class offers convenience methods for logging data document information.
DataDocXML
 
DataDocYAML
This I/O utility class provides methods to load data document instances from YAML documents.
DataGraph
A DataGraph manages a collection of graph data structures and algorithms.
DataGraphCSV
The DataGraphCSV provides a collection of methods that can generate/load a CSV representation of a DataGraph object.
DataGraphEdge
The DataGraphEdge captures data item/doc information for a DataGraph edge.
DataGraphJSON
This I/O utility class provides methods to save/load data graph instances as JSON documents.
DataGrid
A DataGrid manages a collection of columns and rows of data items.
DataGridConsole
The DataGridConsole class provides a convenient way for an application to generate a presentation for the console.
DataGridCSV
The DataGridCSV provides a collection of methods that can generate/load a CSV representation of a DataGrid object.
DataGridCSV.FileFormat
 
DataGridLogger
This class offers convenience methods for logging data grid information.
DataItem
A data item captures a type, name, title, features, values and transient properties.
DataItem.Builder
The Builder class provides utility methods for constructing data items.
DataItemAnalyzer
The Data Item Analyzer class will examine small-to-medium sized data sets to determine their type and value composition.
DataItemLogger
This class offers convenience methods for logging data item information.
DataItemXML
Parses and saves a DataItem as an collection of XML entities.
DataRange
A DataRange is used by DataItem to ensure that their values constrained to an enumerated list or range of values.
DataRangeXML
The DataRangeXML class provides XML helper methods.
DatUtl
The DatUtl class provides static convenience methods for calculating date/time conversions.
DGCriteria
A DGCriteria can be used to express a search criteria for a graph data source.
DGCriteriaLogger
This class offers convenience methods for logging data graph criteria information.
DGCriterion
A DGCriterion is responsible for encapsulating a query item, its operator and one or more values.
Digest
The Digest provides a collection of basic methods for hashing/digesting messages using a random salt algorithm.
DigitalHash
The DigitalHash class provides a simple collection of methods to generate digital hash sequence values (based on the MD5 message digest algorithm) for String objects and files.
DS
The DS (data source) class captures the constants, enumerated types and utility methods for the data source package.
DSCriteria
A DSCriteria can be used to express a search criteria for a data source.
DSCriteriaLogger
This class offers convenience methods for logging data source criteria information.
DSCriteriaXML
The DSCriteriaXML provides a collection of methods that can generate/load an XML representation of a DSCriteria object.
DSCriterion
A DSCriterion is responsible for encapsulating a query item, its operator and one or more values.
DSCriterionEntry
A DSCriterionEntry is responsible for encapsulating a criterion and a boolean operator.
DSException
A Data Source exception and its subclasses are a form of Throwable that indicates conditions that an application developer might want to catch.
FCException
A Foundation Class exception and its subclasses are a form of Throwable that indicates conditions that an application developer might want to catch.
FilUtl
The FilUtl class provides utility methods for copying and zipping files.
IO
The IO class captures the constants, enumerated types and utility methods for the IO package.
IOXML
The IOXML class provides a collection of utility methods that aid in the generation and consumption of an XML DOM hierarchy.
JSONUtil
The JSONUtil class provides a collection of utility methods that aid in the generation and consumption of an JSON streams.
Mail
The Mail class captures the constants, enumerated types and utility methods for the Mail Manager package.
MailAuthenticator
The MailAuthenticator is a helper class that manages the authentication of an email message.
MailManager
The MailManager is responsible capturing messages and sending them to email recipients based on configuration settings.
NumUtl
The NumUtl class provides static convenience methods for determining the type of value the number represents.
Platform
The Platform class provides utility methods for platform-related operations.
PropertyLogger
This class offers convenience methods for logging data property information.
Secret
The Secret provides a collection of basic methods for encrypting and decrypting messages using a password.
Sleep
The Sleep class provides utility methods for pausing program execution.
SmartClientXML
The SmartClientXML provides a collection of methods that can generate/load an XML representation of a SmartClient Datasource object.
StrUtl
The StrUtl class provides utility methods for manipulating and evaluating String objects.
Task
A Task is an interface that defines a collection of methods that the Application Manager will expect an application to implement in order to successfully run within its context.
TaskAbort
The TaskAbort class is a handler for the Runtime.addShutdownHook() method.
WebUtl
The WebUtl class provides utility features to applications that need to construct web URIs.
XMLUtl
The XMLUtl class provides utility features to applications that need to process XML content.
